Tweet:
"Fun" PowerShell shenanigans:

PS> Get-ChildItem -Recurse temp | Select FullName

Works great, unless "temp" doesn't exist... instead of erroring out, your pipeline enters an infinite loop.

Safer:

PS> Get-ChildItem -Recurse temp/** | Select FullName
Cleaned Tweet: "fun" powershell shenanigans:ps> get-childitem -recurse temp select fullnameworks great, unless "temp" exist... instead erroring out, pipeline enters infinite loop.safer:ps> get-childitem -recurse temp/** select fullname
